name: Chill Day
description:
This is my first game, made for the SAGDC Little Awful Jam 2016.

So I don't expect anyone else to be interested, but if you do happen to have any comments I would be happy to receive them!

The theme of the jam is "Chill", so in this game the player's task is to acquire as many "Chill points" during one day as possible by performing enjoyable and relaxing tasks around the house.

It's very short and I guess it has sort of worked out as a kind of memory/puzzle game, where you have to figure out what activities give you what points and when and the best way of getting all the points within the time.

Made using Game Maker, everything was done by me except the music and sounds which I got here:

http://opengameart.org/content/hungry-dino-9-chiptune-tracks-10-sfx
